sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; const ContactPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", subject: "", message: "", feedbackType: "", }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [showSuccess, setShowSuccess] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { id, value } = e.target; if (id === "phone") { const formatted = value .replace(/\D/g, "") .match(/(\d{0,3})(\d{0,3})(\d{0,4})/); const formattedValue = !formatted[2] ? formatted[1] : `(${formatted[1]}) ${formatted[2]}${ formatted[3] ? `-${formatted[3]}` : "" }`; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [id]: formattedValue })); } else { setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [id]: value })); } }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate form submission setTimeout(() => { console.log("Form submitted:", formData); setIsSubmitting(false); setShowSuccess(true); setFormData({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", subject: "", message: "", feedbackType: "", }); setTimeout(() => { setShowSuccess(false); }, 5000); }, 2000); }; return (
